## Overview

The `cointsmall` package implements cointegration tests with endogenous structural breaks 
for very small sample sizes (T < 50), following Trinh (2022).

## Basic Usage

```r
library(cointsmall)

# Generate data
set.seed(123)
T <- 50
X <- matrix(rnorm(T * 2), ncol = 2)
Y <- 2 + 1.5 * X[,1] + 0.8 * X[,2] + rnorm(T, sd = 0.3)

# Test for cointegration
result <- composite_cointegration_test(Y, X, max_breaks = 2)
print(result)
```

See package documentation for more details.
